name: The Daily Good 3.2.22
description:
I love snow days!

I spent most of my life in places that don't get much snow, so it makes the ones I experience pretty special.

I always thought of a snow day as a beautiful time when there is a mass retreat from normal life for a moment. Schools and businesses close. Families come together. Everyone goes outside to enjoy and experience it. There is more laughter and play. The normal concerns of day to day life are forgotten in the wonder of nature. The world becomes quieter in the pause.

There is a sense of calm when sitting inside a warm and cozy house watching the flakes fall from the sky. It’s like a meditative trance as millions of tiny little crystallized bits of water work together to create a blanket of white that covers the earth.
